评论详情: This dress had no tag, no indication of fabric, etc.  It is a different and faded color on sides than front panels. There's no way this is cotton, linen or a combination of them. It's a very cheap stretchy, non breathable fabric.
Returned didn't need it any longer.  Just wasn't a color for me for the event.
I am happy with this, but be sure to buy a larger size and wash on cold.
fabric and print i loved but style best designed for taller persons. fit larger than expected
Wife loved it had pockets for her tums!
Like the feel,  weight, flow and fit of this dress.  So much cooler for summer .  Being 5'  I will have to shorten but that's a normal thing to do for me.  I do not believe you will be disapointed.
I rally love this summer dress. I bought them in just about every color and they are so comfy to wear. They wash up great and are true to size.
cheap fabric, print looked like a childs scribble. Ended up @ Goodwill
T shirt dress. Pretty. Floppy sloppy front pockets tho.  I would buy another one. I like it.
This dress is roomy and so comfy and soft. You could size down.
Liked it very much. The material  Weight
This dress is so comfortable and good for at home or going out to shop. I love it!

评论概述: Plus size comfy nice-looking summer dress/mumu...
评论详情: I am a plus size 3-4x.  My experience is safer to go a size up and they'll fit than be disappointed when it comes and it's too small.  Though 5x is a big number, it worked.  It's great material and very pretty. It fits everywhere and just needs to be hemmed since length is also more.  No complaints.  Happy with it and ordered another one in a different print.  Laura M., Irvine, CA.
Material extremely heavy (especially for a sundress). Ran too big. Pattern misleading. Missed return date, bought One as a gift but will not give it.
Very pretty,soft and comfy
Ankle length and very comfortable.  Colors are quite nice. Material is stretchy and soft
Love it! Fits just loose enough for my liking. Dress up or down depending on accessories. Wash and wear again. Simple and easy summer wear.

The material is very soft and flowing giving a look of elegance. The blue and white dress is a beautiful color. I love that it has pockets but not unflattering. It is a nice weight for summer wear and is true to size. I prefer to hand wash this type of product over machine washing to preserve the texture and look.
I love this dress.  Sooo comfortable.  Nice to have a dress for the cooler weather but still warm days.  Great soft fabric.  Nice price too.  Highly recommend.

For the price, this is a keeper for my summer wardrobe.  Not much shape through the body, so a belt will help. The pink color I ordered was more orange than I expected from the picture, more like a coral, but still pretty.  Just not pink. And it does run big, so I have another dress picked out that will be a size smaller. This “pink” was a tad see-through, so I’ll have to wear a slip with it. I’m tall, so the longer length was a bonus for me.  Yes, it has pockets, but they are a bit oddly placed. More for carrying lightweight items than putting your hands in, or phone and keys.  As another reviewer said, there is one tiny tag with an “L” on it, but no content or washing instruction tag. It seems a soft, stretchy polyester blend, not stiff or thick, soft to the touch. So I’m thinking it will wash and dry on low just fine (though I’ll do so turned inside out to help prevent pilling).

I bought my first one and loved it. It was a tad big on top but it's a beautiful pattern. I'll take it in. I just ordered 3 more and received today. I love them 💗. So comfortable and perfect fit. I'm loosing weight so the large is perfect right now. The patterns are beautiful. Wearing my first one on Holiday Monday! I keep trying these on. Thank you so much for beautiful, affordable dresses. I'll be back for more!!

评论概述: Great summer dress that washes really well.
评论详情: Pretty dress with great feeling material! Perfect for summer dinner out!
Misrepresented. This dress is a very thin synthetic fabric. I could not return it because I could not print the label, it was not working.
Pockets are short, does not feel like cotton/linnen.  It’s more like poly knit!  Ver slippery fabric not what I wanted.It’s heavier weight and very long. And stretchy.
Thought I was buying a linen dress. My mistake, I should’ve looked at the reviews.
Love this. It's comfortable,  cool, light weight and pretty! Really like the slim pockets, they are useful but not bulgy.

评论概述: It runs very big in size
评论详情: Way to big for a large. It’s very hot material specially for Florida this time of year.

This is a stretchy material. Not linen. Not even imitation linen. The size was good though. But not the material that I wanted or expected. Returning.  Update They only gave me half of the dress price $4.36. So they are profiting off your purchase. $10 dress. $9 shipping. But only $4.36 return. They are a scam. And when I contacted Amazon Amazon told me some lame story that they could only give me a Amazon gift card in Return, but they could not refund my original method of payment.

This is a great  dress for the money. Fabric is comfortable and good quality. Would recommend you go a size down because it ran big.
I live in Florida. Polyester blend fabrics trap heat. The dress was advertised as being “linen”, “cotton@…. This is false advertising. Polyester dress.

评论概述: The material is so comfortable! The colors are soft and beautiful.

评论概述: Floral print is not as clear as the picture shows. Blurry and cheap looking...
评论详情: Ordered this dress, and didn't even bother taking it out of its plastic bag because the floral print was totally blurred, looking nothing like the photo in the listing. It looks like a low-res 72-pixel graphic that got enlarged to an even lower-res 20-pixel image. (If you look at the photo, note how the stitching in the collar is in focus, compared to the print.

I received it today, it took a while to get here. It’s pretty, but the fabric is a mystery because it has no tag at all, no fabric content or washing instructions. Can’t remember last time I had that happen, if ever! (And I’m old lol)! I will keep it for around the house and sleeping in.

I was looking for something light in cotton/linen. The description states is as light and cotton and linen. It is not even close to that. It is stretchy spandex material and weighs a ton! Waste of time and money. Thanks for nothing.
To long for my height and larger than I thought

评论概述: They are a little longer than the picture
评论详情: The fact that they’re longer doesn’t bother me the material is good for the price. I like the unique pockets. I bought 2 of them floral prints. I think they are very good compared to what’s on the racks at stores these days
This dress was described as being cotton/linen. After receiving it, I was very disappointed to find that it was made of cheap polyester knit fabric
Does not appear to be linen at all. The colors are not as pretty as advertised. It's ok, I guess. I will wear it. On the plus side, it does have pockets.

评论概述: Nice dress but not cotton or linen
评论详情: Nice, soft dress. Sadly not linen or fully cotton. Seems true to size. No care instructions on the garment. Shipping slow for Amazon but within what they said. Had to pay for shipping.
It’s a great summer/vacation dress. Super soft and comfortable. I’m 5’2” so little long if worn with flats. Looks a little more on the pink side than beige, but still cute. Great purchase!
Hot, uncomfortable fabric. Shape is unflattering.
I’m so happy I bought this! When I get home from work; I strip and put this on! Ha.
Material very heavy. Didn't like the appearance.  The fit was sloppy. Not something  I would recommend.
Nasty fabric!!

评论概述: Size varies according to pattern chosen
评论详情: I ordered this and another pattern.(large) This one was at least x-large. The other fit fine. Comfy & I received many compliments.
NOT COTTON,,Expecting light airy beach cover up, instead the material was a slippery cheap underpants material.
Nice quality knit floral dress. Great feel and comfort. Would by again.
The color is not coffee brown. It is full of orange!

评论概述: Pretty dress not made of linen polyester
评论详情: Like colors dislike quality of stitching and fabric was polyester and is very hot for sitting outside in summer.  Especially when it is suppose to be a sun dress

评论概述: Dress is polyester not cotton and linen as stated in the description
评论详情: Misleading information! I don’t wear polyester
This is a very pretty dress and sizing is correct. The material washes great, no fading or shrinkage.

Another summer outfit I am enjoying this summer. Got 2 the first time and 1 last time. I usually do not buy clothes off Amazon if not prime delivery within a few days but I took a chance on these because of the price being so reasonable and they arrived in a reasonable amount of time (about 10 to 14 days). Very comfortable to wear and people compliment me on them.
Material is not “linen”! And it’s way too big! Sending it back.

This dress fits so well (with the right size) and the fabric is extremely comfortable. It is very flattering and the price is unbelievable. I always wear a medium, but it runs large so I had to order a small. I'm buying two more because I love it so much. Only complaint is that there are no washing instructions, so I'm going to treat it like a delicate.

It has a very saggy shape and I know it’s not cotton/linen. It looks like crappy polyester. Wish I kept the plastic it came it to return. But thankfully it’s under $15!  Runs very large so it looks like a sack on me. And drags on the ground. Going to goodwill!
It’s thick and looks like flannel .  It looks very cheap.  Won’t return it since I’m home bound, so I’ll try to give it away.

Perfect color (got 4,) perfect for any summer activity, but they come VERY, VERY long (like scraping the floor, & I'm 5'6").  Had to have all four cut shorter & hemmed.). They pack exceedingly well, hang up & they smooth out. Also, they dry in about 20 minutes!
Nice material runs very large.  Order at least one or maybe 2 sizes smaller.  Takes a long time to recieve item.
Perfect for summer. I sized down one size and it fits perfectly. I will be ordering more.
Took awhile to get there. Ordered this for mothers day. My mom said she loved it. The colors were nice.
I had to send this back because when I put it on, the print was blurry, ruining the look of the entire dress.  It fit fine but absolutely had to go back.

评论概述: Dress arrived well packaged, timely and as discribed
评论详情: I am happy with the style and fit of this dress as well as the material.  Very comfortable, would purchase again.  Size 16, or XL
Love this dress. However it is very heavy and extremely long!!
NOT COTTON... this is polyesther... not what was advertised...  Not linen either...
Inexpensive, but washes nicely, material soft. Has outer, not side pockets, so no hip bulging! :^). I  Followed size guide-worked out.
I would not recommend buying this dress. Mine ended up in the trash.
It's bigger than I expected. Nice for summer.  Get one size down.
This dress fits perfectly, is very comfortable, and looks great. Going to order one for my daughter.

This sundress is not made of the material described on site. It should be made of a cotton/linen blend material but it looks more like a night gown than a sundress and I don't like how the pockets are sewn on the front of the dress. It is cheaply made, however the daffodil print is pretty.

评论概述: Very comfortable casual dress with pockets
评论详情: I got my wife a large and it fits good. Quality is very nice cotton dress. It's a summer dress so not to thick, but not so thin you can see a bra thru it. Great colors and patterns is her favorite part and of course having pockets.

评论概述: Beautifully made, comfortable and delivered early!!
评论详情: I was wonderfully surprised by an early delivery of this dress. It is soft, fits perfectly and the colors and pattern are true to the image. The pockets make it perfect!! This dress will be work often ~~ thank you!!

评论概述: Placed order on Apr 22, received through USPS on May 7.  Order tracking very worrisome...
评论详情: Product seems fine.  Tracking showed stalled  "Out for Delivery" in wrong state.  Then it showed up days later delivered by USPS.  Glad it finally arrived at my address!
It's soft - more like t shirt so it will be comfortable but definitely not linen

The pattern is so pretty. The quality seems good. I would definitely order a size smaller next time. Usually a XL fits perfect. I'm going to order the next in a Large. It runs big. I'll keep this one to wear with a belt. I'm 5'3" and it hits my ankles. A smaller size will probably be a little shorter on me. Very comfortable.

I bought this dress believing that it would be linen/cotton as advertised. It is polyester. I should have known better than to get something from China. I hate polyester, especially in the summer. The fabric is a very blurry, out of focus print. If you still think you want this junk, order up from your size. I usually take a 1-2x and just to be safe, I ordered 5x. I probably could have gotten a 4x. Very long. On the plus side, it does have pockets.

This is a nice flowy dress. I paid under $15 and it’s worth that price. What you won’t get is a cotton/ linen dress. It’s a polyester blend, and the pattern is a much blurrier version of what is shown (there is a disclaimer about the pattern in the description). I took off one star for the fabric and pattern not being “as advertised”. That being said, for less than $15, I’ll take it!
I really like the feel of this fabric, substantial but still lightweight. Very comfortable and flattering fit. And the print is gorgeous. Ordered another one immediately after trying this on.
Looks like the dress is well made and the fit runs large. I'm an XL and ordered a medium according to the size chart. It fits nicely. The material is very soft and the dress is exactly as shown.
